Package com.buffettinc.hrms.service.communication

Interface MessageService

All Known Implementing Classes:
MessageServiceImpl
public interface MessageService
This interface provides methods to manage Messages between employees in the system.
Since:
2023-07-13
Version:
1.0
Author:
IST 412 Group 5

  • Method Details

    • sendMessage

      Message sendMessage(Employee sender, Employee recipient, String title, String message)
      Sends a message from the sender to the recipient.
      Parameters:
      sender - the sender of the message
      recipient - the recipient of the message
      title - the title of the message
      message - the content of the message
      Returns:
      the created message

    • getSentMessages

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Message> getSentMessages(Employee sender, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a page of messages sent by the specified employee.
      Parameters:
      sender - the sender employee
      pageable - the pagination information
      Returns:
      a page of sent messages

    • getReceivedMessages

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Message> getReceivedMessages(Employee recipient, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a page of messages received by the specified employee.
      Parameters:
      recipient - the recipient employee
      pageable - the pagination information
      Returns:
      a page of received messages

    • markMessageAsRead

      Message markMessageAsRead(UUID messageID)
      Marks a message as read.
      Parameters:
      messageID - the ID of the message to mark as read
      Returns:
      the updated message

    • deleteMessage

      void deleteMessage(UUID messageID)
      Deletes a message.
      Parameters:
      messageID - the ID of the message to delete
